title: Similar to Artifex? A hybrid, playful Serif.
content:
Hi,

i'm looking for a deco serif similar to the style of Artifex/Kimera Type Foundry.  
 [http://www.kimeratype.com/pdf/specimenArtifex.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414205032/http:/www.kimeratype.com/pdf/specimenArtifex.pdf "http://www.kimeratype.com/pdf/specimenArtifex.pdf")  
Artifex is cool (and maybe would match on a "fashion"-project which is in the pipeline), but it is missing lining figures and has only one style (regular), no italics\*, no thicker weights.  
Can you suggest me s.th. similar? Keywords: Deco, hybrid, playful, sharp, "feminine", but not totally "over the top"…

\*this is not so important
author: poms

comments.content: Artifex is fabulous and fortunately there's nothing like it. I'll post something soon though that may fit your criteria...
Zingha matches almost all of my keywords. I think about, thanks.
I looked and looked and came up with Zingha too... :-)
